tweet: The plantar fascia is the thick connective tissue, which supports the arch of the foot.
Symptoms of Plantar Fasciitis: Pain in the bottom of the heel, usually worst in the morning and improving throughout the day.
Symptoms of Plantar Fasciitis: Morning stiffness & a painful limp in the morning,  stiffness goes away after the foot is warmed up.
